topics.body:
Oh man, super clever thing they did in Aria of Sorrow
So to the get the true ending and access a certain area, you need to collect 3 specific souls, and I think beat the regular final boss with them

And the 3 souls abilities are to let you become a bat, absorb health with hits, and shoot 3 fire balls

That 3rd one should be familiar

!http://i.ytimg.com/vi/WAybiJ6Qf1M/hqdefault.jpg!

So to get the true ending, you have to become Dracula

OMG I love it
